column5: Hey all.  It's been a long, LONG 2013 for me but I'm finally back.  I hope all is well and I look forward to seeing what's going on and with luck post some reports.  I just moved to Lindsay so my fishing is going to be very limited while I get set up around the new place.  But if anyone is in the area and is looking for someone to fish with PM ME please!!!  I don't know a soul in this town or where to go.  So for now I'll just work on the house...  Unless that river's holding some fish then look out I'm on my way...  It's GOOD to be back!  G
They,ll let anyone in the back door around here.LOL  Welcome back the new GBW.
River has fish...  bugger...  now you just know I have to go check it out...  too bad most of my stuff is at my folks place still.  I guess I'll have to wing it so to say...
look me up work right at the wellington st bridge, river flowing good right now

look me up work right at the wellington st bridge, river flowing good right now I will. I plan on heading out soon and don't have OFC on my cell yet, but I will soon. I also found this old post about the area and I'm glad I did! http://ontariofishingcommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=19044 My place is SO close to the area and to find out it's closing in a week or so sucks but it's a good thing too.  It's a good thing so I didn't go out and break any laws.  Now to find a panfishing spot below the locks is the key for me...
Good to hear from you Geoff, I was wondering where you got to.
I wa wondering when your be back!  Have fun learning your new neighbourhood.

Welcome to Lindsay GBW! Tks Jimmer  Good to hear from you Geoff, I was wondering where you got to. a bit of a personal break so to say Lew but glad to be back.  I wa wondering when your be back!  Have fun learning your new neighbourhood. thanks Nick.  I'm packed (as best as I can be with almost all my stuff still at my folks place) and heading out later for a walk.
Glad to have you back Geoff. I need a partner to reserve our spots for the Leafs Stanley Cup parade.

Glad to have you back Geoff. I need a partner to reserve our spots for the Leafs Stanley Cup parade. BAAAHAHAHAHA.  I gave up those spots a few years ago.  HH and I now have our own locations and mine isn't so hot for the parade.  Everything else I love so far.  TKS for the WB.  I'm looking forward to being back 'I tells ya!'
Well I'm not far from Lindsay, I usually fish the Kawarthas so I'm usually driving through there. I don't got a boat, but if there's fish to be caught I'm down.
Nice to see you back Geoff.  Glad all is going well for you!!

Well I'm not far from Lindsay, I usually fish the Kawarthas so I'm usually driving through there. I don't got a boat, but if there's fish to be caught I'm down. I'm game either from a boat or not.  My boat's in storage till spring...  Nice to see you back Geoff.  Glad all is going well for you!! Tks MS Joey.  All IS well
